root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 12-b-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: As per the article 13 of the agreement between the United Nations and the World Tourism Organization: “the United Nations recognizes the World Tourism Organization as the appropriate organization to collect, to analyse, to publish, to standardize and to improve the statistics of tourism, and to promote the integration of these statistics within the sphere of the United Nations system.” The World Tourism Organization is the custodian agency for SDG indicator 12.b.1.
